Planet

mass caps

  • 2.0 ± 0.7 (chen & kipping 2016)
  • 2.0 (zeng et al 2016)

radius caps

  • 1.48 +0.08 -0.04 (rogers 2015)
  • 1.23 +0.44 -0.22 (chen & kipping 2016)
  • 1.5 (lopez & fortney 2014)

  • 1.2 (simpson 2016)
